verses.t: Behold, how good{H2896} and how pleasant{H5273} it is for brethren{H251} to dwell{H3427} together{H3162} in unity{H3162}!togetherâ€¦: Heb. even together

It is like the precious{H2896} ointment{H8081} upon the head{H7218}, that ran down{H3381} upon the beard{H2206}, even Aaron's{H175} beard{H2206}: that went down{H3381} to the skirts{H6310} of his garments{H4060};

As the dew{H2919} of Hermon{H2768}, and as the dew that descended{H3381} upon the mountains{H2042} of Zion{H6726}: Lordfor there the {H3068} commanded{H6680} the blessing{H1293}, even life{H2416} for evermore{H5769}.
